title: About Me
body: I'm a junior at UNL, I work part time as a developer at Hudl and enjoy myself some Smash Bros. Melee

title: Microsoft
body: I worked an Dynamics AX with the Budget Planning Team writing in X++ to create a tool that automated the process of generating budget planning templates. This project also required me to work on the Office Addins project using C#.

title: Hudl
body: I've worked at Hudl for 2 years, and have done too much to type here.

link.text: See what I've done at Hudl

title: Free Time
body: I don't have much free time between school and work, but when I have some it's spent coding, playing smash with my friends in Kauffman, or watching anime or Disney classics.

title: Contact Me
body: The easiest way to contact me is probably to email me, you could also tweet at me.
